p: This stage aims at recording the visual information of teeth such as their form, color, fissures, and position on the jaws (Dang et al., 2008). Teeth and jaws should be photographed with different orientations to obtain a complete overview. Currently, we photograph the four sides of the teeth when they are dissociated from the jaw.
